title: Beta client not working?
body:
So I am having a problem with the beta client, and have been since it was still "Alpha client". I can open up the patcher just fine, but when I click the orange launch button the beta client refuses to launch. It won't crash, but after I hit launch it will take the patcher away like normal and I will be left waiting for the client itself to launch. I have waited upwards of two hours before. Unfortunately the client never launches and I have to end through task manager and go back to legacy. What's going wrong?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
There may be a change in your settings that's not allowing the updated client to launch.  Go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to see if that helps.

If the issue persists then there may be an issue with the update itself, in which case a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)might be required.  Let me know if you have any questions!
